mapper.select: select spu.`spu_name`,o.`creat_time`,o.`payment`,o.`status` from `order` as o,`spu` as spu where o.`member_id` = #{member_id} and spu.`id` in (select `spu_id` from `sku` where `id` in (select `sku_id` from `order_item` where `order_id` in (select `id` from `order` where `member_id` = #{member_id})))
